posts.post_content:
Guys..........Hello. For sale are these 4 T200 Fatima team cards, each with a piece missing from a corner or border. They all have nice dark boarders and the Washington card is the only one with slight blurriness. 

Prices include shipping. PM me to reserve or with questions. Payment via Paypal 'gift' preferred over check. Cards will be securely packaged for shipping. Thanks....Matt



Philadelphia Americans......lots of HOF'ers, great contrast, some creasing and edge wear, corner missing, $90

Brooklyn Nationals..... great contrast, dark borders, some light creasing, corner missing, $90

Chicago Americans... great contrast, dark borders, back spotted w/toning, I don't notice any creasing, card is warped but is fine when in holder, corner missing, not really red along bottom border (reflection from scanner), $100

Washington Americans... good contrast, some light creasing, corner wear, a couple areas of light blurriness, $SOLD
